title: ISic000473. Dedication to the Concordia of the Agrigentines
body:
Facsimile Images

Concordiae · Agrigenti-
( vac. 2)norum( vac. 3) sacrum( vac. 2)
res publica Lilybitano-
rum ( vac. 3) dedicantibus
5M(arco) · Haterio Candido pro͡co(n)s(ule)
et L(ucio) · Cornelio Marcello ( vac. 1) q(uaestore)
( vac. 5) pr(o) ( vac. 6) pr(aetore) ( vac. 5)

Apparatus criticus

Text based on autopsy

English translation

Sacred to the Concordia of the Agrigentines; the republic of the Lilybaetani (set this up); Marcus Haterius Candidus proconsul and Lucius Cornelius Marcellus quaestor pro praetore joined them in dedicating (it).

Italian translation

Consacrato alla Concordia degli Agrigentini, la città di Lilibeo: dedicanti Marco Aterio Candido proconsole e Lucio Cornelio Marcello questore propretore

commentary
